hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util

Class Atomics

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.akarnokd.reactive4java.util.Atomics

  • public final class Atomics
extends Object
    Utility classes to perform some AtomicXYZ related operations not supported by the classes themselves.
    Since:
    0.97
    Author:
    akarnokd, 2013.01.12.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static boolean compareExchange(AtomicBoolean ref, boolean compareWith, boolean newValue)
      Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value and replaces it with the newValue if they equal.
      static int compareExchange(AtomicInteger ref, int compareWith, int newValue)
      Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value and replaces it with the newValue if they equal.
      static long compareExchange(AtomicLong ref, long compareWith, long newValue)
      Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value and replaces it with the newValue if they equal.
      static <T> T compareExchange(AtomicReference<T> ref, T compareWith, T newValue)
      Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value by using nullsafe object equality and replaces it with the newValue if they equal.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • compareExchange

        public static <T> T compareExchange(@Nonnull
                    AtomicReference<T> ref,
                    T compareWith,
                    T newValue)
        Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value by using nullsafe object equality and replaces it with the newValue if they equal. The method returns the old value of ref regardless of whether the exchange actually happened.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the element type
        Parameters:
        ref - the target of the exchange
        compareWith - the value to compare against
        newValue - the the new value to replace with
        Returns:
        the old value of the ref

      • compareExchange

        public static boolean compareExchange(@Nonnull
                      AtomicBoolean ref,
                      boolean compareWith,
                      boolean newValue)
        Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value and replaces it with the newValue if they equal. The method returns the old value of ref regardless of whether the exchange actually happened.
        Parameters:
        ref - the target of the exchange
        compareWith - the value to compare against
        newValue - the the new value to replace with
        Returns:
        the old value of the ref

                  int newValue)
        Atomically compares the content of ref with the compareWith value and replaces it with the newValue if they equal. The method returns the old value of ref regardless of whether the exchange actually happened.
